testcase.description: under normal circumstances, file should be opened

testcase.name: lager_crash_log:filesystem_test_/0_0
testcase.description: file can't be opened on startup triggers an error message

testcase.name: lager_crash_log:filesystem_test_/0_0
testcase.description: file that becomes unavailable at runtime should trigger an error message

testcase.name: lager_crash_log:filesystem_test_/0_0
testcase.description: unavailable files that are fixed at runtime should start having log messages written

testcase.name: lager_crash_log:filesystem_test_/0_0
